# Purose

The goal of this script is to prepare files for analysis via Taiji (run separately on GreatLakes)

## Configuration file

```{sh config}
echo "input: "zhang-input.tsv""> zhang_config.yml
echo "output_dir: "output/"">> zhang_config.yml
echo "assembly: "GRCm38"">> zhang_config.yml
```

## Input File

```{r input-file}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
read_csv('Zhang-SraRunTable.txt') %>%
  filter(Treatment=="fed") %>% #ignored fasted wt
  mutate(type="ATAC-seq",
         rep=c(1,2,1,2),
         path=Run,
         format="SRA",
         group=Genotype,
         id=Genotype) %>%
  select(type,id,group,rep,path,format) %>%
    write_tsv('zhang-input.tsv')
```
